#summary Info on debugging

= Debugging =

If a process waits infinitely, used {{{kill -s SIGQUIT <processid>}}} to get debug output of the current state of threads

= Profiling =

{{{
java -Xmx256M -Dhttp.proxyHost=localhost -Dhttp.proxyPort=3128 -Xrunhprof -jar dist/ldspider.0.1-dev.jar -u "http://harth.org/andreas/foaf#ah" -o aha-r4.nq -t 10 -r 2 -m 2 2> aha-r4.log}}}
